author: Christopher Simpson
title: Former South Africa Rugby Union Captain Joost van der Westhuizen Dies at Age 45 | Bleacher Report
text: Former South Africa Rugby Union Captain Joost van der Westhuizen Dies at Age 45 JOHN PARKIN/Associated Press Featured Columnist February 6, 2017 Former South Africa rugby union captain Joost van der Westhuizen has died aged 45. The 1995 Rugby World Cup winner's J9 Foundation announced the news on Monday after he had been in a critical condition over the weekend: Van der Westhuizen was diagnosed with motor neurone disease in 2011. More to follow.
